LanguageData.VREA_NeutroLoss.label: нейтротеча
LanguageData.VREA_NeutroLoss.description: Зменшення нормального обсягу нейтроаміну. Незначна втрата має відносно легкі наслідки, але коли втрата стає серйозною, всі підсистеми сильно порушуються, і андроїд втрачає здатність рухатися. Екстремальна втрата ніколи не призведе до смерті. \n\nВтрата нейтроаміну не відновлюється самостійно. Андроїда потрібно покласти в нейтроліжко і знову наповнити його нейтроаміном.
LanguageData.VREA_NeutroLoss.stages.0.label: незначна
LanguageData.VREA_NeutroLoss.stages.1.label: незначна
LanguageData.VREA_NeutroLoss.stages.2.label: помірна
LanguageData.VREA_NeutroLoss.stages.3.label: серйозна
LanguageData.VREA_NeutroLoss.stages.4.label: екстремальна
LanguageData.VREA_Freezing.label: заморожування
LanguageData.VREA_Freezing.description: Dangerously low core android temperature. Unless re-warmed, freezing will get worse and can result in critical biocomponent damage. Recovery is quick once the android is re-warmed. Avoid freezing by equipping warm clothes on your android in cold environments.
LanguageData.VREA_Freezing.stages.0.label: shivering
LanguageData.VREA_Freezing.stages.1.label: shivering
LanguageData.VREA_Freezing.stages.2.label: minor
LanguageData.VREA_Freezing.stages.3.label: serious
LanguageData.VREA_Freezing.stages.4.label: extreme
LanguageData.VREA_Freeze.label: freeze
LanguageData.VREA_Freeze.description: Frozen tissue caused by exposure to cold without adequate protection. Frostbite is very painful, and frostbitten body parts are often lost.
LanguageData.VREA_Overheating.label: перегрів
LanguageData.VREA_Overheating.description: A generalized disruption to android functioning caused by excessive exposure to heat and sun. The android memory becomes scrambled, leading to faster drain of memory space. Recovery is quick once in a cool area, but if heat exposure continues, android will continue to lose memory space which can result in frequent reformatting.
LanguageData.VREA_Overheating.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.VREA_Overheating.stages.1.label: minor
LanguageData.VREA_Overheating.stages.2.label: serious
LanguageData.VREA_Overheating.stages.3.label: extreme
LanguageData.VREA_ScanningSickness.label: Scanning sickness
LanguageData.VREA_ScanningSickness.description: This person was scanned by a softscanner to produce an android persona subcore. The high-energy scanning device has caused disturbances in their brain chemistry which will take time to resolve themselves. There won't be any long-term damage.
